title: Progreso, Yucatán
description: Progreso is a port city in the Mexican state of Yucatán, located on the Gulf of Mexico in the north-west of the state some 30 minutes north of state capital Mérida (the biggest city on the Yucatán Peninsula) by highway.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
